name: Pair-Dice Dating: Sentenced to Die
description:
What really happens when you die? You end up in Pairgatory and have to date your way out of course!

Pairgatory is the land between death and purification. If you wish to move on to sweet slumber, you have to pass through the gates with the love of your death!

But since you SUCK at dating, we have provided you with some very helpful tools.
Dice! And these are no regular dice. Use these to fill in the blanks in your head and sweep your date off their feet.

Become a pair with dice in this Pair-Dice Dating Sim!
